Wizard/Hawkeye


Wizard:


"but sir wouldn't it be safer if brought the ship to the surface and send a 
probe back to cybertron."


Wizard and hawkeye get up and walk down the hallway and into a room that 
gives them each transmetal body and beast mode. they both walk down the 
hallway to where the bridge is.
